title: A uniformly accurate multiscale time integrator for the nonlinear Klein-Gordon equation in the nonrelativistic regime via simplified transmission conditions
comment: 31 pages, 5 figures. Submitted to IMA Journal of Numerical Analysis
summary: We propose a new and simplified multiscale time integrator Fourier pseudospectral (MTI-FP) method for the nonlinear Klein-Gordon equation (NKGE) with a dimensionless parameter epsilon in (0,1] inversely proportional to the speed of light, and establish its uniform first-order accuracy in time in the nonrelativistic regime, i.e. 0 < epsilon << 1. In this regime, the solution of the NKGE is highly oscillatory in time with O(epsilon^2)-wavelength, which brings significant difficulties in designing uniformly accurate numerical methods. The MTI-FP is based on (i) a multiscale decomposition by frequency of the NKGE in each time interval with simplified transmission conditions, and (ii) an exponential wave integrator for temporal discretization and a Fourier pseudospectral method for spatial discretization. By adapting the energy method and the mathematical induction, we obtain two error bounds in H1-norm at O(h^{m0}+tau^2/epsilon^2) and O(h^{m0}+tau+epsilon^2) with mesh size h, time step tau and m0 an integer dependent on the regularity of the solution, which immediately implies a uniformly accurate error bound O(h^{m0}+tau) with respect to epsilon in (0,1]. In addition, by adopting a linear interpolation of the micro variables with the multiscale decomposition in each time interval, we obtain a uniformly accurate numerical solution for any time t larger than zero. Thus the proposed MTI-FP method has a super resolution property in time in terms of the Shannon sampling theory, i.e. accurate numerical solutions can be obtained even when the time step is much bigger than the O(epsilon^2)-wavelength. Extensive numerical results are reported to confirm our error bounds and demonstrate their super resolution in time. Finally the proposed MTI-FP method is applied to study numerically convergence rates of the NKGE to its different limiting models in the nonrelativistic regime.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新的简化多尺度时间积分傅里叶伪谱方法(MTI-FP)，用于求解非线性Klein-Gordon方程，在非相对论区域(ε<<1)实现了时间上的一致一阶精度，具有超时间分辨率特性。
AI.motivation: 非线性Klein-Gordon方程在非相对论区域(ε<<1)中，解在时间上具有O(ε²)波长的高度振荡特性，这给设计一致精确的数值方法带来了显著困难。现有方法难以在保持精度的同时处理这种多尺度行为。
AI.method: MTI-FP方法基于：(1)在每个时间区间内通过频率进行多尺度分解，并采用简化的传输条件；(2)时间离散采用指数波积分器，空间离散采用傅里叶伪谱方法。通过线性插值微变量，获得任意时间的一致精确数值解。
AI.result: 获得了H1范数下的两个误差界：O(h^{m0}+τ²/ε²)和O(h^{m0}+τ+ε²)，从而推导出关于ε∈(0,1]的一致精确误差界O(h^{m0}+τ)。该方法具有超时间分辨率特性，即使时间步长远大于O(ε²)波长也能获得精确解。
AI.conclusion: 提出的MTI-FP方法在非相对论区域实现了时间上的一致一阶精度，具有超时间分辨率特性，能够有效处理高度振荡的多尺度问题。该方法还可用于数值研究NKGE在不同极限模型中的收敛速率。

title: Acoustic scattering by fractal inhomogeneities via geometry-conforming Galerkin methods for the Lippmann-Schwinger equation
summary: We propose and analyse a numerical method for time-harmonic acoustic scattering in $\mathbb{R}^n$, $n=2,3$, by a class of inhomogeneities (penetrable scatterers) with fractal boundary. Our method is based on a Galerkin discretisation of the Lippmann-Schwinger volume integral equation, using a discontinuous piecewise-polynomial approximation space on a geometry-conforming mesh comprising elements which themselves have fractal boundary. We first provide a semi-discrete well-posedness and error analysis for both the $h$- and $p$-versions of our method for completely arbitrary inhomogeneities (without any regularity assumption on the boundary of the inhomogeneity or of the mesh elements). We prove convergence estimates for the integral equation solution and superconvergence estimates for linear functionals such as scattered field and far-field pattern evaluations, and elucidate how the regularity of the inhomogeneity boundary and the regularity of the refractive index affect the rates of convergence predicted. We then specialise to the case where the inhomogeneity is an ``$n$-attractor'', i.e.\ the fractal attractor of an iterated function system satisfying the open set condition with non-empty interior, showing how in this case the self-similarity of the inhomogeneity can be used to generate geometry-conforming meshes. For the $h$-version with piecewise constant approximation we also present singular quadrature rules, supported by a fully discrete error analysis, permitting practical implementation of our method. We present numerical results for two-dimensional examples, which validate our theoretical results and show that our method is significantly more accurate than a comparable method involving replacement of the fractal inhomogeneity by a smoother prefractal approximation.

AI.tldr: 提出并分析了一种用于具有分形边界的不均匀介质中时谐声散射的数值方法，基于Lippmann-Schwinger体积积分方程的Galerkin离散化，使用几何共形网格上的间断分段多项式近似空间。
AI.motivation: 研究具有分形边界的非均匀介质中的声散射问题，传统方法通常用光滑预分形近似替代分形不均匀性，但这种方法精度有限。需要开发能够直接处理分形边界的数值方法。
AI.method: 基于Lippmann-Schwinger体积积分方程的Galerkin离散化方法，使用几何共形网格上的间断分段多项式近似空间。网格元素本身具有分形边界。首先进行半离散适定性和误差分析，然后针对n-吸引子（满足开集条件且具有非空内部的分形吸引子）特殊情况，利用自相似性生成几何共形网格。对于分段常数近似的h版本，还提出了奇异积分规则。
AI.result: 证明了积分方程解的收敛估计和线性泛函（如散射场和远场模式评估）的超收敛估计。阐明了不均匀边界正则性和折射率正则性如何影响预测的收敛速率。数值结果表明该方法比用光滑预分形近似替代分形不均匀性的可比方法显著更精确。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能够直接处理具有分形边界的不均匀介质中的声散射问题，比传统的光滑预分形近似方法更精确。理论分析和数值结果验证了方法的有效性，特别适用于n-吸引子这类具有自相似结构的分形不均匀性。

title: Scalable Fixed-Point Framework for High-Dimensional Hamilton-Jacobi Equations
summary: We propose a novel, mesh-free, and gradient-free fixed-point approach for computing viscosity solutions of high-dimensional Hamilton-Jacobi (HJ) equations. By leveraging the Hopf-Lax formula, our approach iteratively solves the associated variational problem via a Picard iteration, enabling efficient evaluation of both the solution and its corresponding control without relying on grids, characteristics, or differentiation. We demonstrate the practical efficacy and scalability of the approach through numerical experiments in up to 100 dimensions, including control problems and non-smooth solutions. Our results show that the proposed scheme achieves high accuracy, is highly efficient, and exhibits computational times that are largely independent of dimensionality, highlighting its suitability for high-dimensional problems.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新颖的、无网格、无梯度的定点方法，用于计算高维Hamilton-Jacobi方程粘性解，通过Hopf-Lax公式和Picard迭代求解变分问题，在100维问题中验证了高效性和可扩展性。
AI.motivation: 传统方法在处理高维Hamilton-Jacobi方程时面临维度灾难问题，需要网格、特征线或微分计算，计算成本随维度指数增长。需要开发一种能够高效处理高维问题的无网格、无梯度方法。
AI.method: 基于Hopf-Lax公式，将Hamilton-Jacobi方程转化为变分问题，采用Picard迭代的定点方法求解。该方法无需网格离散化、特征线追踪或微分计算，能够同时计算解和对应的控制。
AI.result: 在高达100维的数值实验中验证了方法的有效性，包括控制问题和非光滑解。结果显示该方法具有高精度、高效率，计算时间基本与维度无关，特别适合高维问题。
AI.conclusion: 提出的无网格、无梯度定点方法能够高效计算高维Hamilton-Jacobi方程的粘性解，解决了传统方法的维度灾难问题，为高维控制问题和偏微分方程求解提供了有前景的新途径。

title: Strong local nondeterminism for stochastic time-fractional slow and fast diffusion equations
summary: We study a class of stochastic time-fractional equations on $\mathbb{R}^d$ driven by a centered Gaussian noise, involving a Caputo time derivative of order $β>0$, a fractional (power) Laplacian of order $α>0$, and a Riemann-Liouville time integral of order $γ\ge0$ acting on the noise. The noise is fractional in time (index $H$) and Riesz-type in space (index $\ell$). We derive sharp Dalang-type necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of a random field solution across almost full parameter range $(α,β,γ;H,\ell)$. Under the Dalang-type conditions, we prove sharp variance bounds for temporal and spatial increments, as well as strong local nondeterminism in time in several regimes (two-sided version for $β=1$ and for parts of the case $β=2$; one-sided version for $0<β<2$) and strong local nondeterminism in space for the whole range of parameters. As applications, we derive exact uniform and local moduli of continuity, Chung-type laws of the iterated logarithm, and quantitative bounds on small ball probabilities. Along the way, we obtain sharp asymptotics for the fundamental solution kernels at $0$ and $\infty$, which may be of independent interest.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了带有Caputo时间导数、分数拉普拉斯算子和Riemann-Liouville时间积分的随机时间分数阶方程，推导了随机场解存在的Dalang型充要条件，并建立了精确的方差界限、强局部非确定性以及多种连续性模和概率界限。
AI.motivation: 研究一类在$\mathbb{R}^d$上由中心高斯噪声驱动的随机时间分数阶方程，这类方程包含Caputo时间导数、分数拉普拉斯算子和Riemann-Liouville时间积分。需要理解这类复杂随机偏微分方程解的存在性条件及其样本路径性质。
AI.method: 采用随机分析框架，研究包含Caputo时间导数（阶数$β>0$）、分数拉普拉斯算子（阶数$α>0$）和Riemann-Liouville时间积分（阶数$γ≥0$）的随机方程。噪声在时间上具有分数性质（指数$H$），在空间上为Riesz型（指数$\ell$）。推导Dalang型充要条件，分析基本解核的渐近性质，建立方差界限和强局部非确定性。
AI.result: 得到了几乎全参数范围$(α,β,γ;H,\ell)$下随机场解存在的尖锐Dalang型充要条件。在满足条件的情况下，证明了时间和空间增量的精确方差界限，以及多个参数区域下的强局部非确定性（$β=1$和部分$β=2$情况下的双边版本，$0<β<2$情况下的单边版本）。获得了精确的一致和局部连续性模、Chung型重对数律以及小球概率的定量界限。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为随机时间分数阶方程提供了完整的理论框架，建立了随机场解存在的尖锐条件，并深入刻画了样本路径的精细性质。基本解核在0和∞处的尖锐渐近性质具有独立的理论价值，为相关随机偏微分方程的研究提供了重要工具。

title: Metric space valued Fréchet regression
summary: We consider the problem of estimating the Fréchet and conditional Fréchet mean from data taking values in separable metric spaces. Unlike Euclidean spaces, where well-established methods are available, there is no practical estimator that works universally for all metric spaces. Therefore, we introduce a computable estimator for the Fréchet mean based on random quantization techniques and establish its universal consistency across any separable metric spaces. Additionally, we propose another estimator for the conditional Fréchet mean, leveraging data-driven partitioning and quantization, and demonstrate its universal consistency when the output space is any Banach space.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了基于随机量化的Fréchet均值估计器，适用于所有可分离度量空间，并证明了其普适一致性；同时提出了条件Fréchet均值的估计器，适用于Banach空间。
AI.motivation: 在可分离度量空间中估计Fréchet均值和条件Fréchet均值缺乏普适的实用估计方法，而欧几里得空间已有成熟方法。
AI.method: 使用随机量化技术构建Fréchet均值的可计算估计器；对于条件Fréchet均值，采用数据驱动的分区和量化方法。
AI.result: 证明了Fréchet均值估计器在所有可分离度量空间中的普适一致性；条件Fréchet均值估计器在输出空间为Banach空间时具有普适一致性。
AI.conclusion: 提出的估计器填补了度量空间中Fréchet均值估计的空白，为广泛的应用场景提供了理论保证和实用工具。

title: Linear Systems and Eigenvalue Problems: Open Questions from a Simons Workshop
summary:
This document presents a series of open questions arising in matrix computations, i.e., the numerical solution of linear algebra problems. It is a result of working groups at the workshop \emph{Linear Systems and Eigenvalue Problems}, which was organized at the Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing program on \emph{Complexity and Linear Algebra} in Fall 2025. The complexity and numerical solution of linear algebra problems %in matrix computations and related fields is a crosscutting area between theoretical computer science and numerical analysis. The value of the particular problem formulations here is that they were produced via discussions between researchers from both groups.
  The open questions are organized in five categories: iterative solvers for linear systems, eigenvalue computation, low-rank approximation, randomized sketching, and other areas including tensors, quantum systems, and matrix functions.

AI.tldr: 该文档总结了2025年秋季Simons研究所"复杂性与线性代数"项目中关于线性系统和特征值问题研讨会上提出的矩阵计算开放性问题，涵盖线性系统迭代求解、特征值计算、低秩近似、随机草图等五个主要领域。
AI.motivation: 该文档的动机是促进理论计算机科学和数值分析两个领域研究者之间的交叉合作，通过研讨会讨论识别矩阵计算中的关键开放性问题，推动线性代数问题在复杂性和数值解方面的研究进展。
AI.method: 通过Simons研究所的"复杂性与线性代数"项目组织研讨会，设立工作组，让理论计算机科学和数值分析领域的研究者进行深入讨论，共同识别和整理矩阵计算中的开放性问题。
AI.result: 整理出了五个主要领域的开放性问题：1) 线性系统的迭代求解器；2) 特征值计算；3) 低秩近似；4) 随机草图方法；5) 其他领域包括张量、量子系统和矩阵函数。
AI.conclusion: 该文档为矩阵计算领域提供了系统性的开放性问题框架，这些由两个学科领域研究者共同提出的问题具有重要的研究价值，能够促进理论计算机科学与数值分析之间的交叉融合，推动线性代数计算方法的发展。

title: Full-Covariance Chemical Langevin Predator--Prey Diffusion with Absorbing Boundaries
summary: Many stochastic Rosenzweig--MacArthur predator--prey models inject ad hoc independent (diagonal) noise and therefore cannot encode the event-level coupling created by predation and biomass conversion. We derive an absorbed, fully mechanistic diffusion approximation and its extinction structure from a continuous-time Markov chain on $\mathbb N_0^2$ with four reaction channels: prey birth, prey competition death, predator death, and a coupled predation--conversion event. Absorbing coordinate axes are imposed to represent the irreversibility of demographic extinction. Under Kurtz density-dependent scaling, the law-of-large-numbers limit recovers the classical RM ODE, while central-limit scaling yields a chemical-Langevin diffusion with explicit drift and full state-dependent covariance. A distinctive signature is the strictly negative cross-covariance $Σ_{12}(N,P)=-mNP/(1+N)$ induced solely by the predation--conversion increment $(-1,1)$. We define the absorbed Itô SDE by freezing trajectories at the first boundary hit and prove strong well-posedness, non-explosion, and moment bounds up to absorption. Extinction has positive probability from every interior state, and predator extinction is almost sure when $m\le c$.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于连续时间马尔可夫链的随机Rosenzweig-MacArthur捕食者-猎物模型，通过吸收扩散近似方法处理种群灭绝问题，揭示了捕食-转化事件产生的负交叉协方差特征。
AI.motivation: 现有随机Rosenzweig-MacArthur模型通常采用独立的（对角线）噪声注入，无法准确描述捕食和生物量转化过程中的事件级耦合关系。需要建立完全机制性的扩散近似来捕捉这些生态相互作用。
AI.method: 从连续时间马尔可夫链出发，定义四个反应通道：猎物出生、猎物竞争死亡、捕食者死亡、以及耦合的捕食-转化事件。采用吸收坐标轴表示种群灭绝的不可逆性，通过Kurtz密度依赖缩放得到经典ODE模型，通过中心极限缩放得到化学-Langevin扩散。
AI.result: 推导出具有明确漂移和全状态依赖协方差的吸收扩散近似，发现捕食-转化增量产生独特的严格负交叉协方差Σ₁₂(N,P)=-mNP/(1+N)。证明了吸收Itô SDE的强适定性、非爆炸性以及吸收前的矩有界性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能够准确编码捕食-转化耦合，从任何内部状态都存在正概率的灭绝，当m≤c时捕食者灭绝几乎必然发生。为随机生态模型提供了更符合生物学机制的数学框架。

title: Banach Control Barrier Functions for Large-Scale Swarm Control
summary: This paper studies the safe control of very large multi-agent systems via a generalized framework that employs so-called Banach Control Barrier Functions (B-CBFs). Modeling a large swarm as probability distribution over a spatial domain, we show how B-CBFs can be used to appropriately capture a variety of macroscopic constraints that can integrate with large-scale swarm objectives. Leveraging this framework, we define stable and filtered gradient flows for large swarms, paying special attention to optimal transport algorithms. Further, we show how to derive agent-level, microscopical algorithms that are consistent with macroscopic counterparts in the large-scale limit. We then identify conditions for which a group of agents can compute a distributed solution that only requires local information from other agents within a communication range. Finally, we showcase the theoretical results over swarm systems in the simulations section.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于Banach控制屏障函数的大规模多智能体系统安全控制框架，通过概率分布建模大规模群体，实现宏观约束与群体目标的集成，并推导出与宏观模型一致的微观分布式算法。
AI.motivation: 研究大规模多智能体系统的安全控制问题，传统方法难以处理超大规模群体的约束和协调，需要开发能够同时处理宏观约束和微观行为的统一框架。
AI.method: 使用Banach控制屏障函数(B-CBFs)框架，将大规模群体建模为空间域上的概率分布，定义稳定和滤波梯度流，特别关注最优传输算法，并推导出与宏观模型一致的微观分布式算法。
AI.result: 建立了大规模群体安全控制的统一理论框架，证明了宏观约束与群体目标的集成可行性，推导出了仅需局部通信的分布式算法，并通过仿真验证了理论结果。
AI.conclusion: Banach控制屏障函数为大规模多智能体系统的安全控制提供了有效的数学框架，能够同时处理宏观约束和微观行为，实现分布式协调控制，具有理论和应用价值。

title: An Asymptotic Law of the Iterated Logarithm for $\mathrm{KL}_{\inf}$
summary: The population $\mathrm{KL}_{\inf}$ is a fundamental quantity that appears in lower bounds for (asymptotically) optimal regret of pure-exploration stochastic bandit algorithms, and optimal stopping time of sequential tests. Motivated by this, an empirical $\mathrm{KL}_{\inf}$ statistic is frequently used in the design of (asymptotically) optimal bandit algorithms and sequential tests. While nonasymptotic concentration bounds for the empirical $\mathrm{KL}_{\inf}$ have been developed, their optimality in terms of constants and rates is questionable, and their generality is limited (usually to bounded observations). The fundamental limits of nonasymptotic concentration are often described by the asymptotic fluctuations of the statistics. With that motivation, this paper presents a tight (upper and lower) law of the iterated logarithm for empirical $\mathrm{KL}_{\inf}$ applying to extremely general (unbounded) data.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了经验KL_inf统计量的非渐近浓度界限，提出了适用于极一般（无界）数据的紧致迭代对数律
AI.motivation: KL_inf是纯探索随机赌博机算法最优遗憾下界和序列检验最优停止时间的基本量，经验KL_inf常用于设计渐近最优算法，但现有非渐近浓度界限在常数和速率方面的最优性存疑，且通常限于有界观测数据
AI.method: 建立了经验KL_inf的紧致（上界和下界）迭代对数律，适用于极一般（无界）数据
AI.result: 提出了适用于广泛无界数据的经验KL_inf统计量的紧致迭代对数律，描述了其非渐近浓度的基本极限
AI.conclusion: 该研究为经验KL_inf统计量的非渐近浓度行为提供了理论保证，有助于改进基于KL_inf的赌博机算法和序列检验的设计

title: On the Resistance Conjecture
comment: Comments are welcome, 30 pages. I am especially happy if people point out missing references
summary: We give an affirmative answer to the resistance conjecture on characterization of parabolic Harnack inequalities in terms of volume doubling, upper capacity bounds and a Poincaré inequalities. The key step is to show that these three assumptions imply the so called cutoff Sobolev inequality, an important inequality in the study of anomalous diffusions, Dirichlet forms and re-scaled energies in fractals. This implication is shown in the general setting of $p$-Dirichlet Spaces introduced by the author and Murugan, and thus a unified treatment becomes possible to proving Harnack inequalities and stability phenomena in both analysis on metric spaces and fractals and for graphs and manifolds for all exponents $p\in (1,\infty)$. As an application, we also show that a Dirichlet space satisfying volume doubling, Poincaré and upper capacity bounds has finite martingale dimension and admits a type of differential structure similar to the work of Cheeger. In the course of the proof, we establish methods of extension and characterizations of Sobolev functions by Poincaré-inequalities, and extend the methods of Jones and Koskela to the general setting of $p$-Dirichlet spaces.

AI.tldr: 本文肯定地回答了关于抛物型Harnack不等式的特征化猜想，证明体积加倍、上容量界和Poincaré不等式这三个条件足以推导出cutoff Sobolev不等式，从而统一处理度量空间、分形、图和流形上的Harnack不等式。

title: Decaying Sensitivity of the Zero Solution for a Class of Nonlinear Optimal Control Problems
summary: We study spatial decay properties of sensitivities in a nonlinear optimal control problem with a graph--structured interaction topology. For a problem with nonlinear decoupled dynamics and quadratic cost, we show that a localized perturbation of the zero reference leads to an optimal trajectory that decays exponentially with the graph distance. The analysis, based on a nonlinear controllability condition, provides a first step toward extending known spatial decay results from linear--quadratic to nonlinear systems. A numerical example illustrates the theoretical findings.

AI.tldr: 研究图结构交互拓扑中非线性最优控制问题敏感性的空间衰减特性，证明零参考的局部扰动会导致最优轨迹随图距离指数衰减
AI.motivation: 将已知的线性-二次系统空间衰减结果扩展到非线性系统，研究图结构交互拓扑中非线性最优控制问题的空间衰减特性

AI.result: 零参考的局部扰动会导致最优轨迹随图距离指数衰减，数值示例验证了理论发现

title: Asymptotically optimal sequential change detection for bounded means
summary: We consider the problem of quickest changepoint detection under the Average Run Length (ARL) constraint where the pre-change and post-change laws lie in composite families $\mathscr{P}$ and $\mathscr{Q}$ respectively. In such a problem, a massive challenge is characterizing the best possible detection delay when the "hardest" pre-change law in $\mathscr{P}$ depends on the unknown post-change law $Q\in\mathscr{Q}$. And typical simple-hypothesis likelihood-ratio arguments for Page-CUSUM and Shiryaev-Roberts do not at all apply here. To that end, we derive a universal sharp lower bound in full generality for any ARL-calibrated changepoint detector in the low type-I error ($γ\to\infty$ regime) of the order $\log(γ)/\mathrm{KL}_{\mathrm{inf}}(Q,\mathscr{P})$. We show achievability of this universal lower bound by proving a tight matching upper bound (with the same sharp $\logγ$ constant) in the important bounded mean detection setting. In addition, for separated mean shifts, we also we derive a uniform minimax guarantee of this achievability over the alternatives.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了复合假设下最快变点检测问题，在平均运行长度约束下，推导了通用的尖锐下界，并在有界均值检测设置中证明了匹配上界。
AI.motivation: 在复合假设变点检测中，当"最难"的前变点分布依赖于未知的后变点分布时，如何表征最佳检测延迟是一个重大挑战。传统的简单假设似然比方法（如Page-CUSUM和Shiryaev-Roberts）在此不适用。
AI.method: 在低第一类错误（γ→∞）情况下，推导了任何ARL校准变点检测器的通用尖锐下界，阶数为log(γ)/KL_inf(Q,𝒫)。在有界均值检测设置中证明了匹配上界，对于分离的均值漂移，还推导了在备择假设上的均匀极小极大保证。
AI.result: 获得了通用尖锐下界log(γ)/KL_inf(Q,𝒫)，并在有界均值检测设置中证明了该下界可达，具有相同的logγ常数。对于分离均值漂移，获得了可达性的均匀极小极大保证。
AI.conclusion: 论文解决了复合假设变点检测中的基本理论问题，提供了通用的性能界限，并在重要实际设置中证明了可达性，为复合假设变点检测提供了理论基础。

title: Numerical stationary states for nonlocal Fokker-Planck equations via fixed points of consistency maps
summary: We propose a fixed-point-based numerical framework for computing stationary states of nonlocal Fokker-Planck-type equations. Instead of discretising the differential operators directly, we reformulate the stationary problem as a nonlinear fixed-point map built from the original PDE and its nonlocal interaction terms, and solve the resulting finite-dimensional problem with a matrix-free Newton-Krylov method. We compare implementations using the analytic Frechet derivative of this map with a simple central-difference approximation. Because the method does not rely on time evolution, it is agnostic to dynamical stability and can detect both stable and unstable stationary states. Its accuracy is determined mainly by the numerical treatment of convolutions and quadrature, rather than by differentiation stencils. We apply the approach to three model problems with linear diffusion, use existing analytical results to verify the outputs, and reproduce known bifurcation diagrams, as well as new bifurcation behaviour not previously observed in this kind of problem.

AI.tldr: 提出基于不动点的数值框架，用于计算非局部Fokker-Planck型方程的稳态解，通过重构为非线性不动点映射并使用矩阵自由Newton-Krylov方法求解，可同时检测稳定和不稳定稳态。
AI.motivation: 传统方法通常直接离散微分算子或依赖时间演化，难以同时检测稳定和不稳定稳态，且精度受微分格式限制。需要一种不依赖动力学稳定性、能同时发现各类稳态的数值方法。
AI.method: 将稳态问题重构为基于原始PDE和非局部相互作用项的非线性不动点映射，使用矩阵自由Newton-Krylov方法求解有限维问题，比较解析Frechet导数和中心差分近似的实现。
AI.result: 方法不依赖时间演化，对动力学稳定性不敏感，能同时检测稳定和不稳定稳态；精度主要由卷积和数值积分的处理决定而非微分格式；在三个线性扩散模型问题中验证了输出，重现了已知分岔图并发现了新的分岔行为。
AI.conclusion: 提出的不动点框架为计算非局部Fokker-Planck型方程的稳态提供了有效数值方法，能够发现传统时间演化方法可能遗漏的不稳定稳态，为研究此类系统的分岔行为提供了新工具。

title: Long-time asymptotics for Airy wanderer line ensembles
summary:
We investigate the long-time behavior of the Airy wanderer line ensembles, an infinite-parameter family of Brownian Gibbsian line ensembles arising as edge-scaling limits of inhomogeneous models in the Kardar--Parisi--Zhang universality class. These ensembles are governed by sequences of nonnegative parameters that encode the asymptotic slopes of the curves at positive and negative infinity. Our main results characterize the fluctuations around this leading-order behavior and establish functional limit theorems for the ensembles near both ends of the spatial axis.
  We show that, at a macroscopic level, an Airy wanderer line ensemble organizes into groups of finitely many curves sharing a common asymptotic slope. After appropriate centering and scaling, each such group converges to a Dyson Brownian motion whose dimension equals the size of the group. In the case where only finitely many slope parameters are positive, we further prove a curve separation phenomenon: the upper curves follow deterministic parabolic trajectories, while the remaining lower curves remain globally flat and converge to the classical Airy line ensemble.

AI.tldr: 研究Airy漫游者线系综的长时间行为，这是KPZ普适类中非均匀模型边缘尺度极限的无限参数布朗吉布斯线系综族，建立了关于空间轴两端的功能极限定理。
AI.motivation: 研究KPZ普适类中非均匀模型的边缘尺度极限——Airy漫游者线系综的长时间行为，这些系综由非负参数序列控制，编码了曲线在正负无穷远处的渐近斜率。
AI.method: 分析Airy漫游者线系综的宏观组织行为，通过适当的中心化和缩放处理，研究曲线按渐近斜率分组的情况，并建立功能极限定理。
AI.result: 1. 在宏观层面，Airy漫游者线系综组织成有限多条共享相同渐近斜率的曲线组；2. 经过适当中心化和缩放后，每个这样的组收敛到维度等于组大小的Dyson布朗运动；3. 当只有有限多个斜率参数为正时，证明了曲线分离现象：上曲线遵循确定性抛物线轨迹，而剩余的下曲线保持全局平坦并收敛到经典Airy线系综。

title: Complexity reduction in online stochastic Newton methods with potential O(N d) total cost
summary: Optimizing smooth convex functions in stochastic settings, where only noisy estimates of gradients and Hessians are available, is a fundamental problem in optimization. While first-order methods possess a low per-iteration cost, their convergence is slow for ill-conditioned problems. Stochastic Newton methods utilize second-order information to correct for local curvature, but the O(d 3 ) per-iteration cost of computing and inverting a full Hessian, where d is the problem dimension, is prohibitive in high dimensions. This paper introduces an online mini-batch stochastic Newton algorithm. The method employs a random masking strategy that selects a subset of Hessian columns at each iteration, substantially reducing the per-step computational cost. This approach allows the algorithm, in the mini-batch setting, to achieve a total computational cost for a single pass over N data points of O(N d), which is comparable to first-order methods while retaining the advantages of second-order information. We establish the almost sure convergence and asymptotic efficiency of the resulting estimator. This property is obtained without requiring iterate averaging, which distinguishes this work from prior analyses.

AI.tldr: 提出一种在线小批量随机牛顿算法，通过随机掩码策略选择Hessian矩阵的子集列，显著降低每次迭代计算成本，在单次遍历N个数据点时总计算成本为O(Nd)，与一阶方法相当但保留二阶信息优势。
AI.motivation: 在随机优化中，一阶方法计算成本低但收敛慢（特别是病态问题），而随机牛顿方法使用二阶信息但计算和求逆完整Hessian矩阵的O(d³)成本在高维中不可行。
AI.method: 采用在线小批量随机牛顿算法，使用随机掩码策略在每次迭代中选择Hessian矩阵的子集列，显著降低每步计算成本。
AI.result: 算法在单次遍历N个数据点时总计算成本为O(Nd)，与一阶方法相当，同时建立了所得估计量的几乎必然收敛和渐近效率，且无需迭代平均。
AI.conclusion: 该方法在保持二阶信息优势的同时，实现了与一阶方法相当的计算效率，为高维随机优化问题提供了有效的解决方案。

title: A penalized φ-FEM scheme for the Poisson Dirichlet problem
summary: In this work, we analyze a penalized variant of the φ-FEM scheme for the Poisson equation with Dirichlet boundary conditions. The φ-FEM is a recently introduced unfitted finite element method based on a level-set description of the geometry, which avoids the need for boundary-fitted meshes. Unlike the original φ-FEM formulation, the method proposed here enforces boundary conditions through a penalization term. This approach has the advantage that the level-set function is required only on the cells adjacent to the boundary in the variational formulation. The scheme is stabilized using a ghost penalty technique. We derive a priori error estimates, showing optimal convergence in the H1 semi-norm and quasi-optimal convergence in the L2 norm under suitable regularity assumptions. Numerical experiments are presented to validate the theoretical results and to compare the proposed method with both the original φ-FEM and the standard fitted finite element method.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种惩罚型φ-FEM方法，用于求解带狄利克雷边界条件的泊松方程，通过惩罚项强制边界条件，仅需在边界相邻单元上使用水平集函数，并使用鬼惩罚技术进行稳定化。
AI.motivation: 传统φ-FEM方法需要在整个域上使用水平集函数来描述几何，而惩罚型φ-FEM方法旨在简化这一过程，仅需在边界相邻单元上使用水平集函数，从而降低计算复杂度和实现难度。
AI.method: 提出了一种惩罚型φ-FEM方案，通过惩罚项来强制狄利克雷边界条件，而不是原始φ-FEM的弱形式。该方法使用水平集函数描述几何，但仅在边界相邻单元上需要水平集函数。采用鬼惩罚技术进行稳定化处理。
AI.result: 推导了先验误差估计，在适当正则性假设下，H1半范数上达到最优收敛，L2范数上达到拟最优收敛。数值实验验证了理论结果，并与原始φ-FEM和标准拟合有限元方法进行了比较。
AI.conclusion: 惩罚型φ-FEM方法在保持原始φ-FEM优点的同时，简化了水平集函数的使用范围，仅需在边界相邻单元上使用，降低了实现复杂度，同时保持了良好的收敛性能。

title: Regularity Estimates for Singular Density Dependent SDEs
summary: Consider the density dependent (i.e. Nemytskii-type) SDEs on $\mathbb R^d$, where the drift $b_t(x,ρ(x),ρ)$ is locally integrable in $(t,x)\in [0,\infty)\times \mathbb R^d$ and may be singular in the distribution density function $ρ$. The relative/Renyi entropies between two time-marginal distributions are estimated by using the Wasserstein distance of initial distributions. When $d=1$ and $b_t$ decays at $t=0$ with rate $t^{\frac 1 2+}$, our the relative entropy estimate coincides with the classical entropy-cost inequality for elliptic diffusion processes. To estimate the Renyi entropy, a refined Khasminskii estimate is presented for singular SDEs which may be interesting by itself.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究密度依赖型SDE的相对熵和Renyi熵估计，通过Wasserstein距离估计初始分布的时间边际分布之间的熵差，在d=1时与经典椭圆扩散过程的熵-成本不等式一致。

AI.method: 使用Wasserstein距离估计初始分布，通过改进的Khasminskii估计来处理奇异SDE，特别针对d=1且漂移项在t=0处以t^{1/2+}速率衰减的情况。
AI.result: 建立了相对熵和Renyi熵的估计方法，当d=1时，相对熵估计与经典椭圆扩散过程的熵-成本不等式一致，并提出了适用于奇异SDE的改进Khasminskii估计。

title: Safe Optimal Control using Log Barrier Constrained iLQR
summary: This paper presents a constrained iterative Linear Quadratic Regulator (iLQR) framework for nonlinear optimal control problems with box constraints on both states and control inputs. We incorporate logarithmic barrier functions into the stage cost to enforce box constraints (upper and lower bounds on variables), yielding a smooth interior-point formulation that integrates seamlessly with the standard iLQR backward-forward pass. The Hessian contributions from the log barriers are positive definite, preserving and enhancing the positive definiteness of the quadratic approximations in iLQR and providing an intrinsic regularization effect that improves numerical stability and convergence. Moreover, since the negative logarithm is convex, the addition of log barrier terms preserves convexity if the cost is already convex. We further analyze how the barrier-augmented iLQR naturally adapts feedback gains near constraint boundaries. In particular, at convergence, the feedback terms associated with saturated control channels go to zero, recovering a purely feedforward behavior whenever control is saturated. Numerical examples on constrained nonlinear control problems demonstrate that the proposed method reliably respects box constraints and maintains favorable convergence properties.

AI.tldr: 提出一种带约束的迭代线性二次调节器框架，通过引入对数障碍函数处理状态和控制输入的箱型约束，实现平滑的内点法求解，保持数值稳定性和收敛性。
AI.motivation: 解决非线性最优控制问题中状态和控制输入的箱型约束问题，传统方法难以有效处理这类约束，需要一种既能保证约束满足又保持良好收敛性的方法。
AI.method: 将对数障碍函数集成到阶段成本中，形成平滑的内点法公式，与标准iLQR的前向-后向传递无缝结合。障碍函数的Hessian矩阵正定性增强了二次近似的正定性，提供内在正则化效果。
AI.result: 该方法能可靠地满足箱型约束，保持良好收敛特性。在约束边界附近，反馈增益自然调整，当控制饱和时，相关反馈项趋近于零，恢复纯前馈行为。
AI.conclusion: 提出的带障碍函数的iLQR框架为非线性最优控制中的箱型约束问题提供了有效解决方案，具有数值稳定、收敛性好、约束满足可靠等优点。

title: An invariant modification of the bilinear form test
summary: The invariance properties of certain likelihood-based asymptotic tests as well as their extensions for M-estimation, estimating functions and the generalized method of moments have been well studied. The simulation study reported in Crudu and Osorio [Econ. Lett. 187: 108885, 2020] shows that the bilinear form test is not invariant to one-to-one transformations of the parameter space. This paper provides a set of suitable conditions to establish the invariance property under reparametrization of the bilinear form test for linear or nonlinear hypotheses that arise in extremum estimation which leads to a simple modification of the test statistic. Evidence from a Monte Carlo simulation experiment suggests good performance of the proposed methodology.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了极值估计中双线性形式检验的重新参数化不变性问题，提出了确保不变性的条件并给出了简单的统计量修正方法。
AI.motivation: Crudu和Osorio的模拟研究表明双线性形式检验对参数空间的一对一变换不具有不变性，这引发了关于该检验在重新参数化下不变性条件的理论研究需求。
AI.method: 为线性或非线性假设的双线性形式检验建立了一套确保重新参数化不变性的合适条件，并提出了检验统计量的简单修正方法。
AI.result: 蒙特卡洛模拟实验表明，所提出的修正方法具有良好的性能表现。
AI.conclusion: 本文为极值估计中的双线性形式检验提供了确保重新参数化不变性的理论框架和实用修正方案，解决了该检验在参数变换下的不变性问题。

title: Finite element approximation for a reformulation of a 3D fluid-2D plate interaction system
summary:
We study a finite element approximation of a coupled fluid-structure interaction consisting of a three-dimensional incompressible viscous fluid governed by the unsteady Stokes equations and a two-dimensional elastic plate. To avoid the use of $H^2-$conforming or nonconforming $\mathbb{P}_2$-Morley plate elements, the fourth-order plate equation is reformulated into a system of coupled second-order equations using an auxiliary variable. The coupling condition is enforced using a Lagrange multiplier representing the trace of the mean-zero fluid pressure on the interface.
  We establish well-posedness and stability results for the time-discrete and fully-discrete problems, and derive a priori error estimates. A partitioned domain decomposition algorithm based on a fixed-point iteration is employed for the numerical solution. Numerical experiments verify the theoretical rates of convergence in space and time using manufactured solutions, and demonstrate the applicability of the method to a physical problem.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种流体-结构相互作用的有限元方法，将四阶板方程转化为二阶方程组，使用拉格朗日乘子处理耦合条件，并建立了数值方法的稳定性和误差估计。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是开发一种避免使用H2-相容或非相容P2-Morley板单元的流体-结构相互作用数值方法。传统方法需要高阶单元，而新方法通过将四阶板方程转化为二阶方程组来简化数值实现。
AI.method: 方法包括：1）将四阶板方程重新表述为耦合的二阶方程组；2）使用拉格朗日乘子表示界面上的平均零流体压力来强制耦合条件；3）建立时间离散和全离散问题的适定性和稳定性；4）采用基于定点迭代的分区域分解算法进行数值求解。
AI.result: 研究结果包括：1）建立了时间离散和全离散问题的适定性和稳定性理论；2）推导了先验误差估计；3）通过数值实验验证了空间和时间收敛的理论速率；4）展示了该方法在物理问题中的适用性。
AI.conclusion: 结论是提出的方法成功避免了传统高阶板单元的使用，通过将四阶方程转化为二阶系统简化了数值实现，同时保持了理论收敛性和实际应用的有效性。该方法为流体-结构相互作用问题提供了一种实用的数值解决方案。

title: The Ising magnetisation field and the Gaussian free field
summary:
We construct a natural coupling between the continuum Gaussian free field (GFF) and the critical Ising magnetisation field (IMF) in a planar domain. In fact, we show that two independent IMFs with $+$ boundary conditions and two independent IMFs with free boundary conditions are a deterministic function of a single instance of the GFF together with a sequence of independent coin flips. This construction should be seen as an extension of the bosonisation phenomenon, and to the best of our knowledge its existence has not been predicted before.
  We arrive at our main result in the continuum by studying novel discrete structures. Our starting point is a coupling resembling the Edwards-Sokal coupling between the Ising model and the Fortuin-Kasteleyn random cluster model, though with role of the latter played by a different percolation model obtained from the double random current model. By taking a scaling limit of the coupling at criticality, we obtain a continuum Edwards-Sokal-like representation of the IMFs in terms of certain two-valued sets of the GFF introduced by Aru, Sepúlveda and Werner.

AI.tldr: 该论文构建了连续高斯自由场(GFF)与临界伊辛磁化场(IMF)之间的自然耦合，揭示了两个独立IMF（+边界条件）和两个独立IMF（自由边界条件）都可以由单个GFF实例和独立硬币投掷序列确定性地表示。
AI.motivation: 研究连续高斯自由场与临界伊辛磁化场之间的耦合关系，扩展玻色化现象，这种耦合的存在性此前未被预测过。
AI.method: 通过研究新颖的离散结构，从类似于Edwards-Sokal耦合的离散耦合出发，但使用双随机电流模型获得的不同渗流模型代替Fortuin-Kasteleyn随机簇模型。在临界点取标度极限，得到基于GFF的特定二值集合的连续Edwards-Sokal式表示。
AI.result: 成功构建了GFF与IMF之间的自然耦合，证明两个独立IMF（+边界条件）和两个独立IMF（自由边界条件）可以由单个GFF实例和独立硬币投掷序列确定性地表示。
AI.conclusion: 该工作扩展了玻色化现象，建立了连续高斯自由场与临界伊辛磁化场之间的耦合关系，为理解这两个重要统计物理模型之间的联系提供了新的视角。

title: An Adaptive Framework for Robust Structural Shape Optimization under Uncertainty
summary: This work proposes an adaptive framework to solve a robust structural shape optimization problem governed by linear elasticity models that account for uncertainties in the loading and material inputs. A posteriori error estimators are constructed to adjust the sample size, mesh size, and step length. The size of the sample set in the stochastic gradient approximation is dynamically determined depending on the variance of the shape derivative. When constructing the a posteriori error estimator in the physical domain, errors arising from the discretization of the deformation bilinear form, which provides a descent direction, are considered, in addition to errors from the discretization of the linear elasticity system. The step length in gradient-based optimization is also adaptively adjusted by estimating the Lipschitz constant of the stochastic shape derivative. Moreover, an analysis of the existence and distributed-form derivation of the stochastic shape derivative is provided. Finally, the proposed estimation-based adaptive stochastic optimization framework is validated on leg-like structural components, demonstrating its effectiveness in minimizing touchdown compliance under uncertain contact forces.

AI.tldr: 提出自适应框架解决考虑载荷和材料不确定性的鲁棒结构形状优化问题，通过后验误差估计动态调整样本量、网格尺寸和步长
AI.motivation: 解决线性弹性模型下结构形状优化问题中的不确定性（载荷和材料输入），传统方法在不确定环境下效果有限，需要自适应框架来处理随机梯度近似和离散化误差
AI.method: 1) 构建后验误差估计器来调整样本量、网格尺寸和步长；2) 根据形状导数的方差动态确定随机梯度近似的样本集大小；3) 在物理域构建后验误差估计器时，同时考虑变形双线性形式离散化误差和线性弹性系统离散化误差；4) 通过估计随机形状导数的Lipschitz常数自适应调整梯度优化步长；5) 分析随机形状导数的存在性和分布形式推导
AI.result: 提出的基于估计的自适应随机优化框架在腿部结构组件上得到验证，有效最小化不确定接触力下的着陆柔度
AI.conclusion: 该自适应框架能够有效处理结构形状优化中的不确定性，通过动态调整计算参数实现鲁棒优化，为考虑不确定性的结构设计提供了有效工具

title: Optimal boundary closures for diagonal-norm upwind SBP operators
summary:
By employing non-equispaced grid points near boundaries, boundary-optimized upwind finite-difference operators of orders up to nine are developed. The boundary closures are constructed within a diagonal-norm summation-by-parts (SBP) framework, ensuring linear stability on piecewise curvilinear multiblock grids. Boundary and interface conditions are imposed using either weak enforcement through simultaneous approximation terms (SAT) or strong enforcement via the projection method.
  The proposed operators yield significantly improved accuracy and computational efficiency compared with SBP operators constructed on equidistant grids. The resulting SBP--SAT and SBP--projection discretizations produce fully explicit systems of ordinary differential equations. The accuracy and stability properties of the proposed operators are demonstrated through numerical experiments for linear hyperbolic problems in one spatial dimension and for the compressible Euler equations in two spatial dimensions.

AI.tldr: 开发了边界优化的迎风有限差分算子（最高九阶），采用非等距边界网格点，在SBP框架下确保线性稳定性，显著提升精度和计算效率。
AI.motivation: 传统等距网格上的SBP算子在边界附近精度有限，需要开发边界优化的算子来提升计算效率和精度，特别是在处理复杂几何和多块网格时。
AI.method: 采用非等距边界网格点构建边界优化的迎风有限差分算子（最高九阶），在SBP框架下确保线性稳定性，使用SAT弱施加或投影法强施加边界和界面条件。
AI.result: 相比等距网格的SBP算子，新算子显著提升了精度和计算效率，形成了完全显式的ODE系统，数值实验验证了线性双曲问题和可压缩Euler方程的精度和稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 边界优化的SBP算子为复杂几何和多块网格上的双曲问题提供了高效稳定的数值离散方法，在精度和计算效率方面优于传统等距网格方法。

title: Universal approximation with signatures of non-geometric rough paths
summary: We establish a universal approximation theorem for signatures of rough paths that are not necessarily weakly geometric. By extending the path with time and its rough path bracket terms, we prove that linear functionals of the signature of the resulting rough paths approximate continuous functionals on rough path spaces uniformly on compact sets. Moreover, we construct the signature of a path extended by its pathwise quadratic variation terms based on general pathwise stochastic integration à la Föllmer, in particular, allowing for pathwise Itô, Stratonovich, and backward Itô integration. In a probabilistic setting, we obtain a universal approximation result for linear functionals of the signature of continuous semimartingales extended by the quadratic variation terms, defined via stochastic Itô integration. Numerical examples illustrate the use of signatures when the path is extended by time and quadratic variation in the context of model calibration and option pricing in mathematical finance.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了粗糙路径签名（包括非弱几何粗糙路径）的通用逼近定理，通过扩展路径的时间项和二次变差项，使得扩展粗糙路径的签名线性泛函能够一致逼近粗糙路径空间上的连续泛函。
AI.motivation: 传统签名方法主要针对弱几何粗糙路径，限制了其在更广泛路径类型（如包含二次变差的路径）中的应用。论文旨在扩展签名理论到非弱几何粗糙路径，特别是包含二次变差项的路径，以增强签名在数学金融等领域的实用性。
AI.method: 1. 通过扩展路径的时间项和粗糙路径括号项来构造扩展粗糙路径；2. 基于Föllmer的路径随机积分理论，构造包含路径二次变差项的签名；3. 在概率设置中，针对连续半鞅使用随机Itô积分定义包含二次变差项的签名；4. 证明扩展粗糙路径签名的线性泛函能够一致逼近粗糙路径空间上的连续泛函。
AI.result: 1. 建立了非弱几何粗糙路径签名的通用逼近定理；2. 证明了扩展粗糙路径签名的线性泛函能够一致逼近粗糙路径空间上的连续泛函；3. 构造了基于Föllmer路径随机积分的包含二次变差项的签名；4. 获得了连续半鞅扩展签名线性泛函的通用逼近结果；5. 通过数值实验展示了扩展签名在金融模型校准和期权定价中的应用。
AI.conclusion: 该论文成功扩展了签名理论到非弱几何粗糙路径，特别是包含二次变差项的路径，建立了相应的通用逼近定理。这一扩展增强了签名在数学金融等实际应用中的实用性，为使用签名方法处理包含随机波动性的金融模型提供了理论基础。

title: Excursion decomposition of the XOR-Ising model
summary:
We study the excursion decomposition of the two-dimensional critical XOR-Ising model with either $+$ or free boundary conditions. In the first part, we construct the decomposition directly in the continuum. This construction relies on the identification of the XOR-Ising field with the cosine or sine of a Gaussian free field (GFF) $φ$ multiplied by $α= 1/\sqrt{2}$, and is obtained by an appropriate exploration of two-valued level sets of the GFF. More generally, the same construction applies to the fields $:\! \cos(αφ) \!:$ and $:\! \sin(αφ) \!:$ for any $α\in (0,1)$.
  In the second part, we show that the continuum excursion decomposition arises as the scaling limit of the double random current decomposition of the critical XOR-Ising model on the square lattice. To this end, we exploit the rich Markovian structure of the discrete decomposition and strengthen the convergence of the double random current height function to the continuum GFF by establishing joint convergence with its cosine and sine. We conjecture that for $α\in [1/2,\sqrt{3}/2)$ the continuum excursion decompositions arise as the scaling limit of those of the Ashkin-Teller polarisation field along its critical line.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究二维临界XOR-Ising模型的游程分解，首先在连续极限下直接构造分解，然后证明该分解是格点模型双随机流分解的标度极限。
AI.motivation: 研究二维临界XOR-Ising模型的游程分解结构，理解其在连续极限下的数学描述，并建立离散格点模型与连续场论之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 1. 在连续极限下，通过将XOR-Ising场识别为高斯自由场(GFF)的余弦或正弦函数，利用GFF的二值水平集探索构造游程分解。2. 在离散格点模型中，利用双随机流分解的马尔可夫结构，证明其标度极限收敛到连续游程分解。
AI.result: 成功构造了连续极限下的游程分解，并证明了该分解是离散临界XOR-Ising模型双随机流分解的标度极限。建立了离散模型与连续场论之间的严格对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 二维临界XOR-Ising模型的游程分解可以在连续极限下严格构造，并且是离散格点模型相应分解的标度极限。这一结果为进一步研究相关临界模型提供了理论基础。

title: From Sequential to Parallel: Reformulating Dynamic Programming as GPU Kernels for Large-Scale Stochastic Combinatorial Optimization
summary: A major bottleneck in scenario-based Sample Average Approximation (SAA) for stochastic programming (SP) is the cost of solving an exact second-stage problem for every scenario, especially when each scenario contains an NP-hard combinatorial structure. This has led much of the SP literature to restrict the second stage to linear or simplified models. We develop a GPU-based framework that makes full-fidelity integer second-stage models tractable at scale. The key innovation is a set of hardware-aware, scenario-batched GPU kernels that expose parallelism across scenarios, dynamic-programming (DP) layers, and route or action options, enabling Bellman updates to be executed in a single pass over more than 1,000,000 realizations. We evaluate the approach in two representative SP settings: a vectorized split operator for stochastic vehicle routing and a DP for inventory reinsertion. Implementation scales nearly linearly in the number of scenarios and achieves a one-two to four-five orders of magnitude speedup, allowing far larger scenario sets and reliably stronger first-stage decisions. The computational leverage directly improves decision quality: much larger scenario sets and many more first-stage candidates can be evaluated within fixed time budgets, consistently yielding stronger SAA solutions. Our results show that full-fidelity integer second-stage models are tractable at scales previously considered impossible, providing a practical path to large-scale, realistic stochastic discrete optimization.

AI.tldr: 开发了基于GPU的框架，使大规模整数第二阶段模型变得可行，通过场景批处理GPU内核实现并行计算，在车辆路径和库存管理问题上获得显著加速
AI.motivation: 传统基于场景的样本平均逼近方法中，为每个场景求解精确的第二阶段问题成本高昂，特别是当每个场景包含NP难组合结构时，这导致文献通常限制第二阶段为线性或简化模型
AI.method: 开发了基于GPU的框架，包含硬件感知的场景批处理GPU内核，在场景、动态规划层和路径/行动选项三个维度上暴露并行性，使Bellman更新能在单次遍历超过100万个实现中执行
AI.result: 在随机车辆路径和库存重新插入两个代表性设置中，实现接近线性的场景数量扩展，获得2-5个数量级的加速，允许更大的场景集和更可靠的第一阶段决策
AI.conclusion: 完整保真度的整数第二阶段模型在以前被认为不可能的规模下变得可行，为大规模、现实的随机离散优化提供了实用路径

title: Spectral Analysis of Block Diagonally Preconditioned Multiple Saddle-Point Matrices with Inexact Schur Complements
summary: We derive eigenvalue bounds for symmetric block-tridiagonal multiple saddle-point systems preconditioned with block-diagonal Schur complement matrices. This analysis applies to an arbitrary number of blocks and accounts for the case where the Schur complements are approximated, generalizing the findings in [Bergamaschi et al., Linear Algebra and its Applications, 2026]. Numerical experiments are carried out to validate the proposed estimates.

AI.tldr: 该论文推导了对称块三对角多重鞍点系统在使用块对角Schur补矩阵预条件时的特征值边界，适用于任意数量的块并考虑了Schur补近似的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究对称块三对角多重鞍点系统的预条件特征值分析，扩展Bergamaschi等人的工作，考虑更一般的Schur补近似情况。
AI.method: 推导对称块三对角多重鞍点系统在使用块对角Schur补矩阵预条件时的特征值边界理论分析，考虑任意数量块和Schur补近似。
AI.result: 获得了对称块三对角多重鞍点系统预条件特征值的理论边界，并通过数值实验验证了所提估计的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为对称块三对角多重鞍点系统的预条件特征值分析提供了理论框架，推广了现有结果并考虑了更实际的近似情况。

title: Twice Epi-Differentiability of Spectral Functions and its applications
summary: Second-order variational properties have been shown to play important theoretical and numerical roles for different classes of optimization problems. Among such properties, twice epi-differentiability has a special place because of its ubiquitous presence in various classes of extended-real-valued functions that are important for optimization problems. We provide a useful characterization of this property for spectral functions by demonstrating that it can be characterized via the same property of the symmetric part of the spectral representation of an eigenvalue function. Our approach allows us to bypass the rather restrictive convexity assumption, used in many recent works that targeted second-order variational properties of spectral functions. By this theoretical tool, several applications on the proto-differentiability of subgradient mappings, the directional differentiability of the proximal mapping of spectral functions are achieved. We finally use our established theory to study twice epi-differentiability of leading eigenvalue functions and practical regularization terms that have important applications in statistics and the robust PCA.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了谱函数的二阶变分性质，特别是二次上微分性，通过特征值函数的对称部分表征该性质，避免了传统方法中的凸性限制。
AI.motivation: 二阶变分性质在优化问题的理论和数值分析中具有重要作用，其中二次上微分性在各种扩展实值函数中普遍存在。现有研究通常需要凸性假设，这限制了应用范围。
AI.method: 通过谱函数的特征值函数对称部分来表征二次上微分性，绕过了传统方法中的凸性限制。该方法将谱函数的二阶性质转化为对称函数的性质。
AI.result: 建立了谱函数二次上微分性的有用表征，证明了该性质可以通过特征值函数的对称部分来刻画。这一理论工具被应用于次梯度映射的原微分性和谱函数邻近映射的方向可微性。
AI.conclusion: 提出的方法为谱函数的二阶变分分析提供了更通用的理论框架，避免了凸性限制。该理论被应用于领先特征值函数和统计、鲁棒PCA中重要正则化项的二次上微分性研究。

title: Relationship between MP and DPP for Risk-Sensitive Stochastic Optimal Control Problems: Viscosity Solution Framework
summary: In this paper, we study the relationship between general maximum principle and dynamic programming principle for risk-sensitive stochastic optimal control problems, where the control domain is not necessarily convex. The original problem is equivalent to a stochastic recursive optimal control problem of a forward-backward system with quadratic generators. Relations among the adjoint processes, the generalized Hamiltonian function and the value function are proved under the framework of viscosity solutions. Some examples are given to illustrate the theoretical results.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了风险敏感随机最优控制问题中一般最大值原理与动态规划原理的关系，其中控制域不一定凸。通过将原问题转化为具有二次生成元的正倒向系统随机递归最优控制问题，在粘性解框架下证明了伴随过程、广义哈密顿函数与值函数之间的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究风险敏感随机最优控制问题中一般最大值原理与动态规划原理的关系，特别是在控制域不一定是凸的情况下。传统的随机最优控制理论通常假设控制域是凸的，本文旨在扩展这一理论框架，处理更一般的非凸控制域情况。
AI.method: 将原始风险敏感随机最优控制问题等价转化为具有二次生成元的正倒向系统随机递归最优控制问题。在粘性解框架下，通过建立伴随过程、广义哈密顿函数与值函数之间的关系，研究一般最大值原理与动态规划原理的联系。
AI.result: 证明了在粘性解框架下，伴随过程、广义哈密顿函数与值函数之间的数学关系。通过一些具体例子验证了理论结果的正确性和适用性。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了风险敏感随机最优控制问题中一般最大值原理与动态规划原理的理论联系，特别是在非凸控制域情况下。该研究扩展了随机最优控制理论的应用范围，为处理更一般的控制问题提供了理论工具。

title: The Signed Wasserstein Barycenter Problem
summary: Barycenter problems encode important geometric information about a metric space. While these problems are typically studied with positive weight coefficients associated to each distance term, more general signed Wasserstein barycenter problems have recently drawn a great deal of interest. These mixed sign problems have appeared in statistical inference setting as a way to generalize least squares regression to measure valued outputs and have appeared in numerical methods to improve the accuracy of Wasserstein gradient flow solvers. Unfortunately, the presence of negatively weighted distance terms destroys the Euclidean convexity of the unsigned problem, resulting in a much more challenging optimization task. The main focus of this work is to study properties of the signed barycenter problem for a general transport cost with a focus on establishing uniqueness of solutions. In particular, when there is only one positive weight, we extend the uniqueness result of Tornabene et al. (2025) to any cost satisfying a certain convexity property. In the case of arbitrary weights, we introduce the dual problem in terms of Kantorovich potentials and provide a sufficient condition for a stationary solution of the dual problem to induce an optimal signed barycenter.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究带符号权重的Wasserstein重心问题，重点关注解的唯一性条件，扩展了现有唯一性结果并建立了对偶问题框架。
AI.motivation: 带符号的Wasserstein重心问题在统计推断和数值方法中具有重要应用，但负权重破坏了问题的凸性，使得优化更具挑战性，需要深入研究其性质和解的唯一性。
AI.method: 研究一般运输成本下的带符号重心问题性质；当只有一个正权重时，扩展Tornabene等人的唯一性结果到满足特定凸性性质的任何成本；对于任意权重情况，引入基于Kantorovich势的对偶问题，并提供对偶问题平稳解诱导最优带符号重心的充分条件。
AI.result: 扩展了带符号Wasserstein重心问题的唯一性理论，建立了更一般的唯一性条件，并提供了通过对偶问题求解带符号重心的理论框架。
AI.conclusion: 带符号Wasserstein重心问题虽然因负权重而失去凸性，但通过建立合适的理论框架和分析方法，仍然可以获得解的唯一性条件和有效的求解途径，这对相关应用领域具有重要意义。

title: Hybrid Quantum-Classical Optimization for Multi-Objective Supply Chain Logistics
summary: A multi-objective logistics optimization problem from a real-world supply chain is formulated as a Quadratic Unconstrained Binary Optimization Problem (QUBO) that minimizes cost, emissions, and delivery time, while maintaining target distributions of supplier workshare. The model incorporates realistic constraints, including part dependencies, double sourcing, and multimodal transport. Two hybrid quantum-classical solvers are proposed: a structure-aware informed tree search (IQTS) and a modular bilevel framework (HBS), combining quantum subroutines with classical heuristics. Experimental results on IonQ's Aria-1 hardware demonstrate a methodology to map real-world logistics problems onto emerging combinatorial optimization-specialized hardware, yielding high-quality, Pareto-optimal solutions.

AI.tldr: 将现实供应链物流优化问题建模为QUBO，使用混合量子-经典求解器在量子硬件上获得高质量Pareto最优解
AI.motivation: 解决现实世界供应链中的多目标物流优化问题，需要在成本、排放和交付时间之间取得平衡，同时满足供应商工作份额分配等约束条件
AI.method: 将问题建模为二次无约束二进制优化问题，提出两种混合量子-经典求解器：结构感知的知情树搜索和模块化双层框架，结合量子子程序和经典启发式方法

title: Distributed Model Predictive Control for Energy and Comfort Optimization in Large Buildings Using Piecewise Affine Approximation
summary: The control of large buildings encounters challenges in computational efficiency due to their size and nonlinear components. To address these issues, this paper proposes a Piecewise Affine (PWA)-based distributed scheme for Model Predictive Control (MPC) that optimizes energy and comfort through PWA-based quadratic programming. We utilize the Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers (ADMM) for effective decomposition and apply the PWA technique to handle the nonlinear components. To solve the resulting large-scale nonconvex problems, the paper introduces a convex ADMM algorithm that transforms the nonconvex problem into a series of smaller convex problems, significantly enhancing computational efficiency. Furthermore, we demonstrate that the convex ADMM algorithm converges to a local optimum of the original problem. A case study involving 36 zones validates the effectiveness of the proposed method. Our proposed method reduces execution time by 86\% compared to the centralized version.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于分段仿射的分布式模型预测控制方案，用于大型建筑的能量与舒适度优化，通过ADMM分解和凸化处理，显著提高了计算效率。
AI.motivation: 大型建筑控制面临计算效率挑战，主要源于系统规模大和非线性组件。传统集中式方法在处理这类问题时计算负担重，需要更高效的分布式解决方案。
AI.method: 提出基于分段仿射的分布式MPC方案，使用ADMM进行有效分解，采用PWA技术处理非线性组件，并引入凸ADMM算法将大规模非凸问题转化为一系列小规模凸问题。
AI.result: 36个区域的案例研究表明，所提方法比集中式版本减少了86%的执行时间，凸ADMM算法能收敛到原问题的局部最优解。
AI.conclusion: 基于PWA的分布式MPC方案能有效解决大型建筑控制中的计算效率问题，显著降低计算时间，同时保证控制性能。

title: Optimistic Bilevel Optimization with Composite Lower-Level Problem
comment: 37 pages. Submitted to Mathematics of Operations Research
summary: This paper introduces a novel double regularization scheme for bilevel optimization problems whose lower-level problem is composite and convex, but not necessarily strongly convex, in the lower-level variable. The analysis focuses on the primal-dual solution mapping of the regularized lower-level problem and exploits its properties to derive an almost-everywhere formula for the gradient of the regularized hyper-objective under mild assumptions. The paper then establishes conditions under which the hyper-objective of the actual problem is well defined and shows that its gradient can be approximated by the gradient of the regularized hyper-objective. Building on these results, a gradient sampling-based algorithm computes approximately stationary points of the regularized hyper-objective, and we prove its convergence to stationary points of the actual problem. Two numerical examples from machine learning demonstrate the proposed approach.

AI.tldr: 提出双层正则化方案解决下层复合凸优化问题，推导正则化超目标梯度公式，设计梯度采样算法并证明收敛性
AI.motivation: 解决下层为复合凸优化（非强凸）的双层优化问题，传统方法在下层非强凸时面临挑战，需要新的正则化方案和分析框架
AI.method: 提出双重正则化方案，分析正则化下层问题的原始-对偶解映射性质，推导正则化超目标梯度公式，设计基于梯度采样的算法
AI.result: 建立了正则化超目标梯度近似实际超目标梯度的条件，证明了算法收敛到实际问题的驻点，并通过机器学习数值示例验证
AI.conclusion: 提出的双重正则化方案有效处理下层非强凸的双层优化问题，理论分析和算法设计为这类问题提供了系统解决方案

title: Relaxation in infinite convex programming under Slater-type regularity conditions
summary: The main purpose of this paper is to close the gap between the optimal values of an infinite convex program and that of its biconjugate relaxation. It is shown that Slater and continuity-type conditions guarantee such a zero-duality gap. The approach uses calculus rules for the conjugation and biconjugation of the sum and pointwise supremum operations. A second important objective of this work is to exploit these results on relaxation by applying them in the context of duality theory.

AI.tldr: 该论文主要研究无限凸规划与其双共轭松弛之间的最优值差距，证明了在Slater条件和连续性条件下可以实现零对偶间隙，并将这些结果应用于对偶理论。
AI.motivation: 解决无限凸规划与其双共轭松弛之间的最优值差距问题，建立保证零对偶间隙的条件，并将这些理论结果应用于对偶理论的实际应用。
AI.method: 使用共轭和双共轭运算的微积分规则，特别是针对和运算与逐点上确界运算的共轭和双共轭计算规则，来分析和证明零对偶间隙的条件。
AI.result: 证明了在Slater条件和连续性条件下，无限凸规划与其双共轭松弛之间存在零对偶间隙，即两者的最优值相等。
AI.conclusion: 通过建立共轭运算的微积分规则，论文成功解决了无限凸规划与双共轭松弛之间的最优值差距问题，为对偶理论提供了重要的理论支撑和应用基础。

title: Convergence Rate of the Last Iterate of Stochastic Proximal Algorithms
summary: We analyze two classical algorithms for solving additively composite convex optimization problems where the objective is the sum of a smooth term and a nonsmooth regularizer: proximal stochastic gradient method for a single regularizer; and the randomized incremental proximal method, which uses the proximal operator of a randomly selected function when the regularizer is given as the sum of many nonsmooth functions. We focus on relaxing the bounded variance assumption that is common, yet stringent, for getting last iterate convergence rates. We prove the $\widetilde{O}(1/\sqrt{T})$ rate of convergence for the last iterate of both algorithms under componentwise convexity and smoothness, which is optimal up to log terms. Our results apply directly to graph-guided regularizers that arise in multi-task and federated learning, where the regularizer decomposes as a sum over edges of a collaboration graph.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了两种解决加性复合凸优化问题的经典算法，在放宽严格的方差有界假设下，证明了两种算法最后迭代的收敛速率可达$\widetilde{O}(1/\sqrt{T})$，该结果直接适用于多任务和联邦学习中的图引导正则化器。
AI.motivation: 传统随机优化算法通常需要严格的方差有界假设才能获得最后迭代的收敛速率，这一假设在实际应用中往往过于严格。本文旨在放宽这一限制，在更现实的条件下分析算法的收敛性能。
AI.method: 分析了两种经典算法：1）针对单一正则化器的近端随机梯度方法；2）随机增量近端方法（当正则化器表示为多个非光滑函数之和时，使用随机选择的函数的近端算子）。在分量凸性和光滑性条件下，证明了两种算法最后迭代的收敛速率。
AI.result: 证明了两种算法在分量凸性和光滑性条件下，最后迭代的收敛速率可达$\widetilde{O}(1/\sqrt{T})$，该速率在对数项内是最优的。这一结果适用于多任务和联邦学习中常见的图引导正则化器，其中正则化器可分解为协作图边的和。
AI.conclusion: 本文在放宽方差有界假设的条件下，为两种经典复合凸优化算法提供了最后迭代收敛的理论保证，扩展了这些算法在更实际场景下的适用性，特别是在多任务和联邦学习等应用领域。

title: Continuized Nesterov Momentum Achieves the $O(\varepsilon^{-7/4})$ Complexity without Additional Mechanisms
summary: For first-order optimization of non-convex functions with Lipschitz continuous gradient and Hessian, the best known complexity for reaching an $\varepsilon$-approximation of a stationary point is $O(\varepsilon^{-7/4})$. Existing algorithms achieving this bound are based on momentum, but are always complemented with safeguard mechanisms, such as restarts or negative-curvature exploitation steps. Whether such mechanisms are fundamentally necessary has remained an open question. Leveraging the continuized method, we show that a Nesterov momentum algorithm with stochastic parameters alone achieves the same complexity in expectation. This result holds up to a multiplicative stochastic factor with unit expectation and a restriction to a subset of the realizations, both of which are independent of the objective function. We empirically verify that these constitute mild limitations.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了仅使用随机参数的Nesterov动量算法可以在期望中达到O(ε^{-7/4})的复杂度，无需重启或负曲率利用等安全机制。
AI.motivation: 现有达到O(ε^{-7/4)复杂度的非凸优化算法都需要动量机制配合重启或负曲率利用等安全机制。这些机制是否必要一直是一个开放性问题。本文旨在研究是否仅使用随机参数的动量算法就能达到相同复杂度。
AI.method: 采用连续化方法，研究仅使用随机参数的Nesterov动量算法。算法参数是随机的，但满足单位期望的乘法随机因子，并且限制在独立于目标函数的实现子集上。
AI.result: 理论证明表明，仅使用随机参数的Nesterov动量算法在期望中可以达到O(ε^{-7/4})的复杂度，与现有需要安全机制的算法相同。实验验证表明随机因子和实现子集的限制是温和的。
AI.conclusion: 本文解决了非凸优化中的一个开放性问题，证明重启和负曲率利用等安全机制并非必要，仅使用随机参数的动量算法就能达到最优复杂度。这为设计更简单的非凸优化算法提供了理论基础。

title: Solving Stochastic Variational Inequalities without the Bounded Variance Assumption
summary: We analyze algorithms for solving stochastic variational inequalities (VI) without the bounded variance or bounded domain assumptions, where our main focus is min-max optimization with possibly unbounded constraint sets. We focus on two classes of problems: monotone VIs; and structured nonmonotone VIs that admit a solution to the weak Minty VI. The latter assumption allows us to solve structured nonconvex-nonconcave min-max problems. For both classes of VIs, to make the expected residual norm less than $\varepsilon$, we show an oracle complexity of $\widetilde{O}(\varepsilon^{-4})$, which is the best-known for constrained VIs. In our setting, this complexity had been obtained with the bounded variance assumption in the literature, which is not even satisfied for bilinear min-max problems with an unbounded domain. We obtain this complexity for stochastic oracles whose variance can grow as fast as the squared norm of the optimization variable.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了无界方差或无界域假设下的随机变分不等式求解算法，主要关注可能具有无界约束集的极小极大优化问题，在单调VI和弱Minty VI结构的非单调VI两类问题上，实现了期望残差范数小于ε的Õ(ε⁻⁴)的oracle复杂度。
AI.motivation: 现有随机变分不等式算法通常需要方差有界或定义域有界的假设，但这些假设在无界域的双线性极小极大问题中甚至不成立。本文旨在解决无界方差和无界域情况下的随机VI求解问题。
AI.method: 针对两类问题：单调变分不等式；以及具有弱Minty VI解的结构化非单调变分不等式。后者允许解决结构化非凸-非凹极小极大问题。研究在方差可以随优化变量范数平方增长的随机oracle下的算法。
AI.result: 在无界方差和无界域假设下，实现了期望残差范数小于ε的Õ(ε⁻⁴)的oracle复杂度，这是约束变分不等式问题中已知的最佳复杂度。这一结果在文献中仅在方差有界假设下获得过。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功解决了无界方差和无界域情况下的随机变分不等式求解问题，为具有无界约束集的极小极大优化提供了有效的算法保证，扩展了随机VI算法的适用范围。

title: Efficient Algorithms for Robust Markov Decision Processes with $s$-Rectangular Ambiguity Sets
summary: Robust Markov decision processes (MDPs) have attracted significant interest due to their ability to protect MDPs from poor out-of-sample performance in the presence of ambiguity. In contrast to classical MDPs, which account for stochasticity by modeling the dynamics through a stochastic process with a known transition kernel, a robust MDP additionally accounts for ambiguity by optimizing against the most adverse transition kernel from an ambiguity set constructed via historical data. In this paper, we develop a unified solution framework for a broad class of robust MDPs with $s$-rectangular ambiguity sets, where the most adverse transition probabilities are considered independently for each state. Using our algorithms, we show that $s$-rectangular robust MDPs with $1$- and $2$-norm as well as $φ$-divergence ambiguity sets can be solved several orders of magnitude faster than with state-of-the-art commercial solvers, and often only a logarithmic factor slower than classical MDPs. We demonstrate the favorable scaling properties of our algorithms on a range of synthetically generated as well as standard benchmark instances.

AI.tldr: 本文为具有s-矩形模糊集的鲁棒马尔可夫决策过程开发了一个统一求解框架，相比现有商业求解器可将求解速度提升数个数量级，仅比经典MDP慢对数因子。
AI.motivation: 鲁棒MDP能够保护MDP在存在模糊性时免受样本外性能差的影响，但现有求解方法效率较低。本文旨在开发高效的统一求解框架来解决具有s-矩形模糊集的鲁棒MDP问题。
AI.method: 开发了一个统一求解框架，专门针对具有s-矩形模糊集的鲁棒MDP，其中每个状态的最不利转移概率被独立考虑。该框架适用于1-范数、2-范数和φ-散度模糊集。
AI.result: 提出的算法相比最先进的商业求解器可将求解速度提升数个数量级，通常仅比经典MDP慢对数因子。在合成生成和标准基准实例上展示了良好的扩展性能。
AI.conclusion: 本文为s-矩形鲁棒MDP提供了一个高效统一的求解框架，显著提升了计算效率，使其在实际应用中更加可行。

title: Nonsmooth Optimization with Zeroth Order Comparison Feedback
summary: We study unconstrained optimization problems of nonsmooth, nonconvex Lipschitz functions, using only noisy pairwise comparisons governed by a known link function. Our goal is to compute a $(δ,\varepsilon)$-Goldstein stationary point. We combine randomized smoothing with a novel unbiased reduction from comparisons to local value differences. By leveraging a Russian-roulette truncation on the Bernoulli-product expansion of the inverse link, we construct an exactly unbiased estimator for directional differences. This estimator has finite expected cost and variance scaling quadratically with the function gap, $\mathcal{O}(B^2)$, under mild conditions. Plugging this into the smoothed gradient identity enables a standard nonconvex SGD analysis, yielding explicit comparison-complexity bounds for common symmetric links such as logistic, probit, and cauchit.

AI.tldr: 研究非光滑、非凸Lipschitz函数的无约束优化问题，仅使用由已知链接函数控制的噪声成对比较，目标是计算(δ,ε)-Goldstein平稳点。
AI.motivation: 在实际应用中，许多优化问题涉及非光滑、非凸函数，且只能通过噪声比较（如用户偏好）而非精确函数值来评估。传统优化方法需要精确梯度信息，这在仅能获得比较反馈的场景中不适用。
AI.method: 结合随机平滑技术和从比较到局部值差异的无偏约简方法。通过俄罗斯轮盘赌截断伯努利乘积展开的逆链接函数，构建方向差异的完全无偏估计器。将该估计器插入平滑梯度恒等式，使用标准非凸SGD分析。
AI.result: 构建的估计器具有有限期望成本和与函数间隙平方成正比的方差O(B²)。为常见对称链接函数（如logistic、probit、cauchit）提供了明确的比较复杂度界限。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功解决了仅通过噪声成对比较优化非光滑、非凸Lipschitz函数的问题，能够计算Goldstein平稳点，并为常见链接函数提供了理论保证。

title: A Smooth Locally Exact Penalty Method for Optimization Problems over Generalized Stiefel Manifolds
summary: In this paper, we consider a class of optimization problems constrained to the generalized Stiefel manifold. Such problems are fundamental to a wide range of real-world applications, including generalized canonical correlation analysis, linear discriminant analysis, and electronic structure calculations. Existing works mainly focuses on cases where the generalized orthogonality constraint is induced by a symmetric positive definite matrix M, a setting where the geometry essentially reduces to that of the standard Stiefel manifold. However, many practical scenarios involve a singular M, which introduces significant analytical and computational challenges. Therefore, we propose a Smooth Locally Exact Penalty model (SLEP) and establish its equivalence to the original problem in the aspect of stationary points under a finitly large penalty parameter. This penalty model admits the direct application of various unconstrained optimization techniques, with convergence guarantees inherited from established results. Compared to Riemannian optimization approaches, our proposed penalty mode eliminates the need for retractions and vector transports, hence significantly reducing per-iteration computational costs. Extensive numerical experiments validate our theoretical results and demonstrate the effectiveness and practical potential of the proposed penalty model SLEP.

AI.tldr: 提出SLEP惩罚模型解决广义Stiefel流形上的优化问题，特别是针对奇异M矩阵的情况，避免了黎曼优化中的回缩和向量传输操作，降低了计算成本。
AI.motivation: 现有研究主要关注对称正定矩阵M诱导的广义正交约束，这种情况下几何结构可简化为标准Stiefel流形。然而许多实际应用涉及奇异M矩阵，这带来了显著的分析和计算挑战。
AI.method: 提出平滑局部精确惩罚模型(SLEP)，在有限大的惩罚参数下建立与原问题在驻点层面的等价性。该惩罚模型允许直接应用各种无约束优化技术，并继承已有收敛性保证。
AI.result: 与黎曼优化方法相比，SLEP模型消除了对回缩和向量传输的需求，显著降低了每次迭代的计算成本。广泛的数值实验验证了理论结果，证明了SLEP的有效性和实际潜力。
AI.conclusion: SLEP惩罚模型为处理广义Stiefel流形上的优化问题，特别是涉及奇异M矩阵的情况，提供了一种高效的计算框架，避免了黎曼几何的复杂性，同时保持了理论保证。

title: Characterizations of the Aubin property of the KKT-mapping in composite optimization by SC derivatives and quadratic bundles
summary: For general set-valued mappings, the Aubin property is ultimately tied to limiting coderivatives by the Mordukhovich criterion. Likewise, the existence of single-valued Lipschitzian localizations is related to strict graphical derivatives. In this paper we will show that for the special case of the KKT-mapping from composite optimization, the Aubin property and the existence of single-valued Lipschitzian localizations can be characterized by SC derivatives and quadratic bundles, respectively, which are easier accessible than limiting coderivatives and strict graphical derivatives.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了复合优化中KKT映射的Aubin性质和单值Lipschitz局部化的特征，提出了比传统方法更易处理的SC导数和二次束方法。
AI.motivation: 对于一般集值映射，Aubin性质通常通过Mordukhovich准则与极限余导数相关，而单值Lipschitz局部化则与严格图形导数相关。这些传统方法在复合优化的KKT映射这一特殊情况下可能过于复杂，需要更易处理的特征方法。
AI.method: 针对复合优化中的KKT映射，作者提出了使用SC导数（可能指次微分或某种特定导数）来刻画Aubin性质，以及使用二次束来刻画单值Lipschitz局部化的存在性。这些方法相比传统的极限余导数和严格图形导数更易计算和验证。
AI.result: 论文证明了对于复合优化的KKT映射，Aubin性质和单值Lipschitz局部化的存在性可以分别通过SC导数和二次束来完全刻画，这些特征工具比传统的极限余导数和严格图形导数更容易获取和应用。
AI.conclusion: 对于复合优化这一重要特殊情形，存在比一般集值映射理论更简单有效的特征工具，SC导数和二次束为分析KKT映射的稳定性性质提供了更实用的方法，简化了相关理论的应用。

title: On Circuit Diameter and Straight Line Complexity
summary:
The circuit diameter of a polyhedron is the maximum length (number of steps) of a shortest circuit walk between any two vertices of the polyhedron. Introduced by Borgwardt, Finhold and Hemmecke (SIDMA 2015), it is a relaxation of the combinatorial diameter of a polyhedron. These two notions of diameter lower bound the number of iterations taken by circuit augmentation algorithms and the simplex method respectively for solving linear programs.
  Recently, an analogous lower bound for path-following interior point methods was introduced by Allamigeon, Dadush, Loho, Natura and Végh (SICOMP 2025). Termed straight line complexity, it refers to the minimum number of pieces of any piecewise linear curve that traverses a specified neighborhood of the central path.
  In this paper, we study the relationship between circuit diameter and straight line complexity. For a polyhedron $P:=\{x\in \mathbb{R}^n: Ax = b, x\geq \mathbf{0}\}$, we show that its circuit diameter is up to a $\mathrm{poly}(n)$ factor upper bounded by the straight line complexity of linear programs defined over $P$. This yields a strongly polynomial circuit diameter bound for polyhedra with at most 2 variables per inequality. We also give a circuit augmentation algorithm with matching iteration complexity.

title: Non-Stationary Inventory Control with Lead Times
summary: We study non-stationary single-item, periodic-review inventory control problems in which the demand distribution is unknown and may change over time. We analyze how demand non-stationarity affects learning performance across inventory models, including systems with demand backlogging or lost-sales, both with and without lead times. For each setting, we propose an adaptive online algorithm that optimizes over the class of base-stock policies and establish performance guarantees in terms of dynamic regret relative to the optimal base-stock policy at each time step. Our results reveal a sharp separation across inventory models. In backlogging systems and lost-sales models with zero lead time, we show that it is possible to adapt to demand changes without incurring additional performance loss in stationary environments, even without prior knowledge of the demand distributions or the number of demand shifts. In contrast, for lost-sales systems with positive lead times, we establish weaker guarantees that reflect fundamental limitations imposed by delayed replenishment in combination with censored feedback. Our algorithms leverage the convexity and one-sided feedback structure of inventory costs to enable counterfactual policy evaluation despite demand censoring. We complement the theoretical analysis with simulation results showing that our methods significantly outperform existing benchmarks.

title: Objective-Function Free Multi-Objective Optimization: Rate of Convergence and Performance of an Adagrad-like algorithm
summary: We propose an Adagrad-like algorithm for multi-objective unconstrained optimization that relies on the computation of a common descent direction only. Unlike classical local algorithms for multi-objective optimization, our approach does not rely on the dominance property to accept new iterates, which allows for a flexible and function-free optimization framework. New points are obtained using an adaptive stepsize that does not require neither knowledge of Lipschitz constants nor the use of line search procedures. The rate of convergence is analyzed and is shown to be $\mathcal{O}(1 / \sqrt{ k+1})$ with respect to the norm of the common descent direction. The method is extensively validated on a broad class of unconstrained multi-objective problems and simple multi-task learning instances, and compared against a first-order line search algorithm. Additionally, we present a preliminary study of the behavior under noisy multi-objective settings, highlighting the robustness of the method.

title: Normalization of ReLU Dual for Cut Generation in Stochastic Mixed-Integer Programs
summary: We study the Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU) dual, an existing dual formulation for stochastic programs that reformulates non-anticipativity constraints using ReLU functions to generate tight, non-convex, and mixed-integer representable cuts. While this dual reformulation guarantees convergence with mixed-integer state variables, it admits multiple optimal solutions that can yield weak cuts. To address this issue, we propose normalizing the dual in the extended space to identify solutions that yield stronger cuts. We prove that the resulting normalized cuts are tight and Pareto-optimal in the original state space. We further compare normalization with existing regularization-based approaches for handling dual degeneracy and explain why normalization offers key advantages. In particular, we show that normalization can recover any cut obtained via regularization, whereas the converse does not hold. Computational experiments demonstrate that the proposed approach outperforms existing methods by consistently yielding stronger cuts and reducing solution times on harder instances.
